title: Montefiore COVID-19 Resource Center | Schedule Your COVID-19 Vaccination Online
description: The latest COVID-19 updates, including testing, treatment, visitor policy and service changes.
cleaned_text: Schedule Your COVID-19 Vaccination Online If you are eligible to receive the COVID-19 vaccine based on the [current NY State guidelines](https://covid19vaccine.health.ny.gov/phased-distribution-vaccine), click below to schedule the first dose of your vaccination. If you need assistance, please call our hotline at [1-844-444-CV19](tel:18444442819) ( [1-844-444-2819](tel:18444442819)) and select option 1 to schedule your vaccination appointment. To learn more about the COVID-19 vaccine, please visit our [COVID-19 Vaccine page](/covid-19-vaccine#main-content). Image
